import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { changeFileList, deleteFileList } from 'webapp/art/reducer/art.reducer' const ArtFile = ({ uuid, originalFileName }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [artFile, setArtFile] = useState({ workedDate: "", uuid: uuid, originalFileName: originalFileName, repImg: false }) const artFileChange = e => { e.stopPropagation() e.preventDefault() const { name, value } = e.target artFile[name] = value setArtFile({ ...ArtFile}) console.log(artFile) console.log(e.target.getAttribute("data-uuid")) dispatch(changeFileList({ uuid: e.target.getAttribute("data-uuid"), file: { ...artFile } })) } const repImgChange = e => { e.stopPropagation() e.preventDefault() console.log(e.target.value) artFile.refImg = !artFile.refImg setArtFile({ ...artFile }) dispatch(changeFileList({ uuid: e.target.getAttribute("data-uuid"), file: { ...artFile } })) console.log(e.target.value) console.log("repImg", artFile) } const artFileDelete = e => { e.stopPropagation() e.preventDefault() dispatch(deleteFileList({ uuid: e.target.getAttribute("data-uuid"), file: { ...artFile }})) } return ( <>

{artFile.originalFileName}
artFileChange(e)} /> {!artFile.repImg ? <>
: <> } ) } export default ArtFile
